page.title: 18FIELD SPORTS AROUND WHALTON
page.content: Being essentially a farming community, field sports flourish. The local fox_ hounds,{The Morpeth Hunt,}are very well supported and currently have, at least, 200 members actively involved and a flourishing Supporter's Club. Many of the men enjoy shooting and this is largly{game shooting,}not clay. Pheasant,partridge,duck,hares and rabbits are the quarry. There are three good shoot syndicates and a game farm in this area and several small rough shoots.{Fishing}is confined to trout only and is not of much consequence here even in the Wansbeck river. However, the source of the Wansbeck at Sweethope lough is now a prolific trout lake, well stocked and well patronised.
